articles.description: Rumors that the couple, who started dating in 2016, have either gotten engaged or even secretly tied the knot have been circling online for years.
articles.content:
Joe Alwyn is staying tight-lipped on the status of his relationship with Taylor Swift.
The British actor, 31, declined to confirm or deny rumors that he and his superstar girlfriend, 32, are engaged… [+1680 chars]
